sourcesContent: import{createStitches as e}from"@stitches/react";import o from"./common";import t from"./light-theme";import s from"./dark-theme";import r from"../utils/deep-merge";export const getStitchesTheme=e=>r(e,o.theme);const c=e({...o,theme:{...o.theme,shadows:{...t.shadows},colors:{...o.theme.colors,...t.colors}}});export const createThemeBase=c.createTheme;export const styled=c.styled;export const css=c.css;export const globalCss=c.globalCss;export const keyframes=c.keyframes;export const getCssText=c.getCssText;export const theme=c.theme;export const config=c.config;export const sharedFocus=css({WebkitTapHighlightColor:"transparent","&:focus:not(&:focus-visible)":{boxShadow:"none"},"&:focus":{outline:"none",boxShadow:"0 0 0 2px $colors$background, 0 0 0 4px $colors$primary"},"@safari":{WebkitTapHighlightColor:"transparent",outline:"none"}});export const cssFocusVisible=css({variants:{isFocusVisible:{true:{outline:"none",boxShadow:"0 0 0 2px $colors$background, 0 0 0 4px $colors$primary !important"}}}});export const sharedVisuallyHidden=css({border:"0px",clip:"rect(0px, 0px, 0px, 0px)",height:"1px",width:"1px",margin:"-1px",padding:"0px",overflow:"hidden",whiteSpace:"nowrap",position:"absolute"});export const createTheme=({type:e,theme:o,className:c})=>{if(!e)throw new Error("Theme type is required");return createThemeBase(c||`${e}-theme`,r("dark"===e?s:t,o))};
